T02D2211:183b-1: mantra aa lam k'a ra n'a ma t'i k'a //
T02D2211:183b-3: sngags ba rgyan gyi 'grel ba zhes bya ba //
T02D2211:183b-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2211:183b-5: dus mtha' rtsod pa rgyas dus su //
T02D2211:183b-6: nyi zla lta bu'i mthu mnga' zhing //
T02D2211:183b-7: thams cad sel cing snad pa yi //
T02D2211:183b-8: dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi dang //
T02D2211:183b-9: rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2211:183b-10: bla ma'i man ngag brtson pa yi //
T02D2211:183b-11: nyi mas mun pa sel ba bzhin //
T02D2211:183b-12: tshig sgrib snad par byed pa yi //
T02D2211:183b-13: rtsa ba'i 'grel du gsungs pa yin /
T02D2211:183b-14: de la myur du nas bshad pa'i bar du ma bkral lo //
T02D2211:183b-15: gang zhig rnal 'byor ba yis ni //
T02D2211:183b-16: sngags la gtso cher byed pa yi //
T02D2211:183b-17: rigs bzang don dang ldan pa yis //
T02D2211:183b-19: gang zhig rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'og tu sngags bzlas par 'brel to //
T02D2211:183b-20: sngags la gtso bor ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ma yin te /
T02D2211:183b-21: sngags kha nas bzlas par 'brel to //
T02D2211:183b-22: rigs bzang don ldan ni rin po che'i rigs la dbang la sogs pa bzhi dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2211:183b-23: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu /
T02D2211:183b-24: sngags kyi mi mthun kun spangs nas //
T02D2211:183b-25: bsnyen pa'i gnas su legs 'dug ste //
T02D2211:183b-26: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas ni /
T02D2211:183b-27: rang sde nyam dga' ba'i yul lo //
T02D2211:183b-28: sngags kyi mi mthun zhes pa ni dge ba dang sdig byed ma nag la sogs pa'o //
T02D2211:183b-29: bsnyen pa'i gnas ni byang ris skyob pa la sogs pa /
T02D2211:183b-30: snyan pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D2211:183b-31: der tshes bzhi la 'dug ces 'og ma dang 'brel to //
T02D2211:183b-32: sems sbyang lhag pa'i lhar gyur te //
T02D2211:183b-33: bsrung dang tshogs bsag stong bar bsgom //
T02D2211:183b-35: sems sbyang lhag pa'i lha ni sems ni smon 'jug ste /
T02D2211:183b-36: theg pa chen por sems bskyed pa'o //
T02D2211:183b-37: 'jug pa'i rim pa yang stong pa nyid las rang
T02D2211:183b-38: lhag pa'i ltar h'um gis bskyed par 'brel te rang
T02D2211:183b-39: gis so // bsrung ba ni bka' bsgo zhing bskrad
T02D2211:183b-40: pa dang ma song ba la bsad pa'i thog dbab
T02D2211:183b-41: cing rdo rje la sogs pa'i bsrung ba'i gzhi bsgom
T02D2211:183b-42: gis so // par 'brel to // de ni dag dang lus kyi las su gsungs te /
T02D2211:184a-1: tshogs bsag ces pa ni bsod nams kyi yan lag bcu ste /
T02D2211:184a-2: rten dang ba'i ngo bos bshags par 'brel to //
T02D2211:184a-3: stong pa ni ye shes kyi yan lag ste /
T02D2211:184a-4: med cing mi dmigs pa ste phyi nang ngo //
T02D2211:184a-5: de las rang gi sems nyid ni yi ge h'um gi rnam pa las /
T02D2211:184a-6: bh'um 'phros gzhal yas khang par gyur //
T02D2211:184a-7: zhes pa la stod pa de'i dad las sems nyid h'um byung ste /
T02D2211:184a-8: de las gzhal yas khang gi bh'um rnam par bskyed pa'o //
T02D2211:184a-9: yang na ni rang gi sgrub thabs las byung ba bzhin bskyed par gsungs so //
T02D2211:184a-10: de steng h'um las cho ga gsum //
T02D2211:184a-11: dpal ldan gtum po'i gzugs su snang //
T02D2211:184a-13: gdan lnga dang ldan pa'i thog tu h'um las cho
T02D2211:184a-14: ga gsum gyis gtum po ni mi'u thung gi gzugs
T02D2211:184a-16: g-yas na rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
T02D2211:184a-17: g-yon pas bya khyud nges par bsnams //
T02D2211:184a-18: sku mdog sngon po dpa' bo'i chas //
T02D2211:184a-20: g-yas pa'i phyag na ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa /
T02D2211:184a-21: rigs lnga yang yongs su gzung ngo //
T02D2211:184a-22: g-yon na bya khyud bsnams pa ste /
T02D2211:184a-23: klu'i gdon drug 'dul bar byed pa'o //
T02D2211:184a-24: sku mdog sngon po na bza' sngon po ste //
T02D2211:184a-25: rang gi ngo bo phyir byung ba des 'dul ba'o //
T02D2211:184a-26: dpa' bo'i chas ni rakta so ris tshom bu dang //
T02D2211:184a-27: stag la sogs pa brgyad du gsungs //
T02D2211:184a-30: g-yon brkyang g-yas bskum 'bying bag can //
T02D2211:184a-31: zhes pa la zhabs g-yon brkyang g-yas bskum pa ni /
T02D2211:184a-32: sems can 'dul ba dang rang la skyon med par yongs su gzung ngo //
T02D2211:184a-33: 'gying bag ni rang gi stobs nye bar ston pa ste /
T02D2211:184a-34: nyam da med pa'i lha yongs su gsal bar bsgom par gsungs so //
T02D2211:184a-35: ye shes bstim dang byin brlabs nas //
T02D2211:184a-36: dbang bskur 'bras bu lnga dang ldan //
T02D2211:184a-37: zhes pa ni h'um las ye shes pa spyan drangs te /
T02D2211:184a-38: bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ste rang gi lus ngag yid gsum la /
T02D2211:184a-39: yi ge gsum gsal bar bya ste /
T02D2211:184a-40: bstim pa dang dbang bskur ba ni chu dad dbu rgyan dang rdo rje dril bu'i dbang dang lngas /
T02D2211:184a-41: kun gzhi dang nyon mongs pa dang rnams par rtog
T02D2211:184a-42: pa dang sgo lnga'i rnam shes gnas pa ni ye
T02D2211:184a-43: shes lnga dang 'bras bu rigs lnga dang ldan par
T02D2211:184b-0: @184b gsungs so // de yang lung las /
T02D2211:184b-1: bdag nyid gsal bar gyur pa ni //
T02D2211:184b-2: ye shes byin brlab dbang bskur nas //
T02D2211:184b-5: rdo rje sngags kyi bzlas pa bya //
T02D2211:184b-6: bdag dang gzhan pa'i rnam pa yis //
T02D2211:184b-7: rags pa dang ni phra ba yis //
T02D2211:184b-9: rdo rjes ni bsgom pa'i rjes la bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D2211:184b-10: de min par ni ma yin no //
T02D2211:184b-11: bdag gsal ba dang gzhan gsal ba dang /
T02D2211:184b-12: gtso bo gsal ba ni bdag khyab byed min pas
T02D2211:184b-13: gtso bo la bdag ces bya ba'i sgra 'jug pas
T02D2211:184b-15: de ni gzhal yas khang dang dur khrod mi ro la sogs pa gsal ba'o //
T02D2211:184b-16: rags pa ni rnam pa ci gsal ba phra ba ni spyan dang smin ma dang /
T02D2211:184b-17: zhag gi zo ris la sogs pa yongs su gzung do //
T02D2211:184b-18: shin tu phra ba'i rnam pa ste /
T02D2211:184b-19: sems dpa' sum brtsegs gzhal yas khang //
T02D2211:184b-20: gsal bar byed pa de nyid de ;
T02D2211:184b-21: / rnal 'byor tshul gyis yongs su sgrub //
T02D2211:184b-23: shin tu phra ba ni rin po che nang gi
T02D2211:184b-24: ye shes dang rdo rje dang h'um gi rnam par
T02D2211:184b-25: gsungs so // de yang ye shes pa'i ngo bo
T02D2211:184b-26: gsum du gsungs te brtsegs mar 'dug pas brtsegs ma'o
T02D2211:184b-27: gsungs so // // gzhal yas khang rags pa gsal ba ste /
T02D2211:184b-28: gong gi don gyis yongs su gsal bas 'dir ma bris so //
T02D2211:184b-29: rnal 'byor ni rang gi zhi gnas kyi lha gsal ba ste /
T02D2211:184b-30: blta bar bya ba'i do bo'i rigs pas zin pa ni /
T02D2211:184b-31: thun bzhi'i tshul du byed pa ni chen po'i rnal 'byor /
T02D2211:184b-32: de yang stong ba nyid la zhugs rnal 'byor //
T02D2211:184b-34: 'dod chags zhe sdang ni zhes pa nas spang bar bya ba'i bar la /
T02D2211:184b-35: drug rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa 'dod chags la sogs pa drug dang /
T02D2211:184b-36: khro ba la sogs pa nyi shu nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams sngags pas spangs te//
T02D2211:184b-37: de dang 'byar ba'i sngags ni dngos grub mi 'byung bar gsungs so //
T02D2211:184b-38: de nas de bskyed pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka spang bar gsung te /
T02D2211:184b-39: kun ka'i rgyu ru 'gro chad do //
T02D2211:184b-40: des na chang ni nyon mongs pa'i tsa bar gsungs so //
T02D2211:184b-41: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro /
T02D2211:184b-42: de bzhin reg bya la sogs pa //
T02D2211:184b-43: g-yeng bar gyur pa ma lus pa /
T02D2211:184b-44: sngags kyi dus su spang bar bya //
T02D2211:185a-1: sgrub pa pos 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po g-yeng
T02D2211:185a-2: ba'i rgyu yin pas des de ni yongs su spang
T02D2211:185a-3: bar gsungs te dgra yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2211:185a-4: sgra chen po dang sgra chung dang //
T02D2211:185a-5: skyen pa dang ni bul ba dang //
T02D2211:185a-6: mi gsal yan lag nyams pa dang //
T02D2211:185a-7: gsang sngags par du sgra zhugs dang //
T02D2211:185a-8: dmigs pa ma rdzogs 'jog pa dang //
T02D2211:185a-9: sngags kyi dus su spad bar bya //
T02D2211:185a-10: zhes bya ba la sgra che ba ni /
T02D2211:185a-11: nam mkha'i sgra ste gsang ba'i man dag nyams pa'o //
T02D2211:185a-12: chud ba ni sngags kyi brjod pa nyams pa ste sbang ba'o //
T02D2211:185a-13: skyen pa dang bul ba ni sgra dma' zhing nyams
T02D2211:185a-14: pa sogs skyon du ma las nus pa 'byung ba'i
T02D2211:185a-15: rgyu ni rgyu gcig las ma yin te /
T02D2211:185a-16: sgra mi gsal zhing yi ge mthu nyams pa dang
T02D2211:185a-17: bar du mi tshig gis ma chod par bya ste
T02D2211:185a-18: mi tshig gis bar chod pa ni sngags ma yin
T02D2211:185a-19: te / mthu med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2211:185a-20: des na de rnams skyon yin pas spang bar gsungs so //
T02D2211:185a-23: sgra chud nus pa chud bar 'gyur //
T02D2211:185a-24: skyen 'gyur lus kyi phrad pa nyams //
T02D2211:185a-25: bul 'gyur sngags kyi grongs ma skyol //
T02D2211:185a-26: mi gsal yan lag nyams pa yis //
T02D2211:185a-27: bzlas pa'i mthu rnams med par 'gyur //
T02D2211:185a-28: gsang sngags zhugs na gdug pa'i bar chod 'byung //
T02D2211:185a-30: dmigs pa ma rdzogs 'jog pa dang /
T02D2211:185a-31: sngags kyi dus su spad par bya //
T02D2211:185a-32: rjes kyi rnal 'byor ma lus par //
T02D2211:185a-33: zhes pa la dmigs ba rdzogs par //
T02D2211:185a-34: dam cad pa'i grangs las 'das pa'o //
T02D2211:185a-35: de ma rdzogs par ni bzas pa bya ba ste mi bya ba ni spad bar gsungs so /
T02D2211:185a-36: rjes kyi rnal 'byor ni thun bzhi'i rnal 'byor gyis
T02D2211:185a-37: phyag btsal ba la sogs pa yongs byas pa 'gro
T02D2211:185a-38: 'dug nyal ba'i spyod lam gyis bsgrub par gsungs so
T02D2211:185a-39: // dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma dang //
T02D2211:185a-40: ro dang dbang bskur la sogs pa //
T02D2211:185a-42: dus ni lo'am zla ba'i bar du'o //
T02D2211:185a-45: nyi shu rtsa ba'i grangs su'o //
T02D2211:185a-46: bsnyen pa nye bsnyen bsgrub pa dang //
T02D2211:185a-47: bsgrub pa chen po'i tshul du bsgrub //
T02D2211:185a-49: ro dang dbang bskur ni shi ba'i ro la dang
T02D2211:185b-0: po bgegs bskrad khrus byas @185b rgyan gdags te rgyun
T02D2211:185b-1: chags dang rtsam lus par bya ste //
T02D2211:185b-2: sngags zlos shing rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gsum bsgrub
T02D2211:185b-3: pa la ro lha'i ngo bor bskyed la zhag bdun
T02D2211:185b-4: gyi nang par sreg khang me'i gzhal yas khang du
T02D2211:185b-7: dbang gi bsnyen pa ni gong du mtshan ma thob
T02D2211:185b-8: bas gtso bor 'bum dang 'khor rnams khri ru gsungs
T02D2211:185b-9: so // sems dpa' sum brtsegs gsal ba yis //
T02D2211:185b-10: rang nyid thig le'i ngo bo yis //
T02D2211:185b-12: 'od dkar zhi ba'i tshul du bzlas //
T02D2211:185b-13: zhes pa la sems dpa' sum brtsegs ni sku dang gsung dang thugs gsal ba las /
T02D2211:185b-14: rang nyid h'um gi thig le las sngags dang 'od
T02D2211:185b-15: gsal ba ni 'od zer la yig 'bru zhon nas
T02D2211:185b-16: snying gar mgal me bzhin bskor ba'o //
T02D2211:185b-17: de las 'od zer nyi ma'i tshul gyis 'od de yang dkar po sdig pa 'khrung pa'o //
T02D2211:185b-18: de ni 'od dkar pos zhi bar bya bar gsung //
T02D2211:185b-20: rang bzhin tshur 'dus gdug rtsub spyod //
T02D2211:185b-21: zhes pa la yang ni gong ma btags pa yin te /
T02D2211:185b-22: 'od 'phros nas ye she 'khor lo'i gnas gsum 'od
T02D2211:185b-23: zer gyis sku gsum mnyes nas tshur la 'gus pas
T02D2211:185b-24: gnod pa'i gdug sems dang rang gi bag chags la
T02D2211:185b-26: yang na dmigs pa med pa las //
T02D2211:185b-28: zhes pa la dmigs pa ni dngos po'o //
T02D2211:185b-29: dngos po la med par ye shes pa las 'od 'phros nas /
T02D2211:185b-30: tshul byin dang 'od zer dang sku'i rnam par gsungs te man dag go //
T02D2211:185b-32: rnam smin la sogs bsreg cing sbyong //
T02D2211:185b-33: zhes pa la rang gi thig le las 'od phar
T02D2211:185b-34: 'phros pas mnyes te dkar dmar 'dus pas ni bsreg
T02D2211:185b-36: rnam par smin pa dad nus mthu la sogs pa spyod zhing ba sreg pa'o //
T02D2211:185b-37: des ni zhi ba dang drag por gsungs te /
T02D2211:185b-38: mi smra ba'i ngo bos bzlas par gsungs so //
T02D2211:185b-40: mtshan ma 'dod pa nam pa lnga //
T02D2211:185b-42: rang nyis 'khor la mos na 'khor gang yang rung ba bskyed la bzlas par gsungs so //
T02D2211:185b-43: lnga po de ni gong du bsnyen pa'o bzlas par gsungs so //
T02D2211:186a-1: zhes pa nas tshad kyi bar la gcig la sogs pa 'bum dang /
T02D2211:186a-2: nyis 'bum ni grangs kyi bzlas par gsungs te /
T02D2211:186a-3: rtsa ba na gsal bas ma bris so //
T02D2211:186a-4: de yi grogs 'gyur bzlas pa ni //
T02D2211:186a-5: sdig pa dbyung dang bsreg pa ni //
T02D2211:186a-6: bkur ba'i don la dmigs pa ste //
T02D2211:186a-7: rags dang phra ba'i dbang dag tu //
T02D2211:186a-8: drug dang dgu ru shes par bya //
T02D2211:186a-10: bsnyen pa'i grogs lus ngag yid kyi sdig pa dbyung ba dang bsreg pa dang bskur ba ste /
T02D2211:186a-11: gdon pa ni snying ga dang lte bar bsreg pa dang /
T02D2211:186a-12: spyi bo nas bkru bar gsungs so //
T02D2211:186a-13: rags pa'i dbang du drug gis bkru ba ma yin
T02D2211:186a-14: te dngos po 'don pa dang bsreg pa ni rags
T02D2211:186a-15: par gsungs pa bkru ba'i cha dang 'brel bas dgu
T02D2211:186a-16: ru gsungs so // sdig pa dbyung ba la sogs kyang //
T02D2211:186a-17: mi drug gzugs dang de bzhin du //
T02D2211:186a-18: yi ge'i gzugs dang 'od kyi gzugs //
T02D2211:186a-19: de dag dbyung gtor bsreg cing bkru //
T02D2211:186a-21: sdig pa ni lus ngag yid kyi las sam rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa'o //
T02D2211:186a-22: lus ni sngom mam sdig pa'i gzugs so //
T02D2211:186a-24: yid ni 'od dpung nag por gsungs so //
T02D2211:186a-25: de yang snying las au sat ya mtha' can gyis gdon pa dang /
T02D2211:186a-26: lte ba'i ham las me 'bar nas dzv'a la ram gyi sngags kyis bsreg par gsungs so //
T02D2211:186a-27: bkru ba ni aa las spyi bo nas chu 'bebs pas shu to'i sngags kyis bkru'o //
T02D2211:186a-28: h'um dang ham dang aa yis ni //
T02D2211:186a-29: gdon dang bsreg dang bkru ba ni //
T02D2211:186a-30: ma lus las rnams 'grub par gsungs //
T02D2211:186a-31: dmigs pa gsar rnying bye brag gis //
T02D2211:186a-32: mgal me phreng ba nyi ma'o //
T02D2211:186a-34: dmigs pa gsar pa ni rnal 'byor pa thog mar
T02D2211:186a-35: mgal me la brten par gsungs pa ni phreng ba
T02D2211:186a-36: dang nyi ma'o // mchog gis ni gsum tshang ba la bzlas par gsungs so //
T02D2211:186a-37: sngags kyi dngos grub nas grogs su 'gro ba'i bar la rtsa ba na gsal bas ma bris so //
T02D2211:186a-38: rjes kyi rnal 'byor tshul dang ldan //
T02D2211:186a-39: bsnyen sgrub chen po la sogs pas //
T02D2211:186a-40: yongs su bsgrubs pas dngos grub 'byung //
T02D2211:186a-42: rjes kyi rnal 'byor ni spyod lam gyi rim pa'i
T02D2211:186a-43: dus su tsha tsha la sogs pa yongs su bya'o
T02D2211:186b-1: sgrub pa chen po la sogs pas yongs su bsgrub po //
T02D2211:186b-2: de bsgrub na dngos grub yongs su 'byung bar gsungs so //
T02D2211:186b-4: 'di yang sgrub pa'i rtags su gsungs //
T02D2211:186b-5: zhes pa'i bar du dngos dang rmi lam na grub
T02D2211:186b-6: rtags bstan pa yin pas brjod pa med de gsal
T02D2211:186b-8: de dag bzlas pa nas shes par bya ba'i bar
T02D2211:186b-9: du bzlas pa'i dngos te bzlas pa'i sngags su gsungs
T02D2211:186b-10: so // mig gi mngon shes bsgrub pa ni //
T02D2211:186b-11: sku gsungs thugs kyi rnam pa la //
T02D2211:186b-13: bsnyen pa skyol bas de bzhin bya //
T02D2211:186b-15: da ni khyad par gyi bzlas pa gsungs te /
T02D2211:186b-17: rang la sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge bkod la /
T02D2211:186b-18: ye shes pa'i 'od zer 'phros shing tshul 'dus pas
T02D2211:186b-19: mig gi sgrib pa dag pas sha'i spyan dang ldan
T02D2211:186b-20: par gsungs shing // mtshan ma'i bsnyen ba skyol bas 'grub par gsungs so //
T02D2211:186b-21: rna ba dang ni dbang po gzhan //
T02D2211:186b-22: gong ma de bzhin sbyor shes bya'o //
T02D2211:186b-24: rna ba la sogs pa gzhan rnams la ni /
T02D2211:186b-25: sku gsum mam a'a: dang h'um gyis 'phros pa dang 'dus pas /
T02D2211:186b-26: de'i dngos por dag par byas te /
T02D2211:186b-27: snang ba dag par bsgrub par gsungs so //
T02D2211:186b-28: gang zhig phrin las rnam bzhi las /
T02D2211:186b-29: dang po zhi ba gsungs pa ni //
T02D2211:186b-30: zhi ba ni zhi ba'i ste dgra bgegs zhi bar 'dod pa'o //
T02D2211:186b-32: rang gi sdig dang bag chags dang //
T02D2211:186b-33: gzhan gyi gdug rtsub zhi bar byed //
T02D2211:186b-35: kha dog dkar po 'phros pas rang gi sdig pa'i dngos po dang /
T02D2211:186b-36: kun nas dkris pa'i bag chags zhi ba dang /
T02D2211:186b-37: gzugs dang sgra med khams kyi gnod byed kyi dbal dang gdug rtsub zhi bar song zhes gsungs so //
T02D2211:186b-38: tshe dang rigs rgyud longs spyod rnams //
T02D2211:186b-40: zhes pa ni de la des tshe ring ba dang /
T02D2211:186b-41: rang gi rigs rgyud dar ba dang /
T02D2211:186b-42: longs spyod ni lha'i longs spyod dang ldan par 'dod
T02D2211:186b-43: pa rnams kyis 'od dang lha dang ser po'i 'phro
T02D2211:186b-45: rang gi snying po la pushtim ku ru aom zhes pa gdags so //
T02D2211:187a-2: rang bzhin tshe rnams rgyas par byed //
T02D2211:187a-4: rang gi 'od rin chen gos sngon can la 'phros te /
T02D2211:187a-5: des h'um gi dngos po gsal bar sbyangs pa ni
T02D2211:187a-6: nyi ma dang zla ba'i bar du a'a li dang
T02D2211:187a-9: 'jig rten rigs rgyud rgyas par byed //
T02D2211:187a-11: rang dang ldan pa'i 'od ye shes 'khor lo la
T02D2211:187a-12: phog bas thig le a'a li dang k'a li'i ngo
T02D2211:187a-13: bor spyan drangs pa'i ngo bo des de la srung
T02D2211:187a-15: las des bu la sogs pa dar zhing rgyas bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2211:187a-16: nor dang rdzas ni rgyas 'dod pas //
T02D2211:187a-17: rin chen bcud kyi tshul du sgrub //
T02D2211:187a-19: nor dang rdzas rgyas nas bde bar gshegs pa mchod par 'dod pas /
T02D2211:187a-20: ram gyis bdud rtsi ster ba bum pa kha rgyan dang ldan pa'i nang du /
T02D2211:187a-21: rgyal po bskyed la mchod pas mchod de /
T02D2211:187a-22: aom bee shra ba na ye sa ma ya ba
T02D2211:187a-23: sham ku ru ho: / zhes pa dang 'brel ba
T02D2211:187a-24: ni sgrub pa'o // bya grub ye shes ngo bo ste //
T02D2211:187a-25: rin chen mchod rten ne'u le bsnams //
T02D2211:187a-26: sgrub pa'i dgos 'dod skong mdzad ma //
T02D2211:187a-27: rnam thos nor ster khyod la bstod //
T02D2211:187a-29: de'i nor ni sum cha gsum du spyod par gsungs so //
T02D2211:187a-30: kha dog dmar po'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D2211:187a-31: dmigs pa ma lus dbang du sdud //
T02D2211:187a-33: 'od zer dmar po kha dog dmar po lha la
T02D2211:187a-34: phog pas gang dmigs pa ni lha dang klu dang
T02D2211:187a-35: srin po la sogs pa dbang du sdud de de
T02D2211:187a-36: yang ba sham ku ru ho: zhes pa dang 'brel
T02D2211:187a-37: to // tshar gcod dus kyi sbyor ba ni //
T02D2211:187a-39: bkug cing thob la sogs pas //
T02D2211:187a-41: gru gsum dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor du ling+ga'i gzugs
T02D2211:187a-42: bcug la ye shes kyi 'khor lo las 'od zer
T02D2211:187a-43: dmar po 'phros pa'i 'od las lcags kyu thogs pa
T02D2211:187a-44: mang po 'phros nas rang dbang med par bkug ste
T02D2211:187a-45: thim pa ni bsdigs pa ste /
T02D2211:187a-46: sngags bzhis bstims la thob dang /
T02D2211:187a-47: ral gri la sogs pas phab nas med par byas pa'o //
T02D2211:187a-48: drag po'i mtshon cha thog phab pas //
T02D2211:187a-49: spyi bo gtsug gnas rnams su ni //
T02D2211:187a-50: phung po gzhig pa'i sbyor ba bya //
T02D2211:187b-0: lus ngag drag po dang bcas pa'i @187b khro bos mtshon cha'i thog 'bebs pa'o //
T02D2211:187b-1: spyi gtsug nas rkang pa'i mthil du /
T02D2211:187b-2: phur pa brgyab cing de'i phung po lnga la sogs
T02D2211:187b-3: pa 'jig par 'gyur te de ni phung bo bshig
T02D2211:187b-4: pa'o // sa bon 'joms dang 'byed byed pas //
T02D2211:187b-6: zhes pa la sa bon 'joms pa ni byang sems bskam pa ste /
T02D2211:187b-7: ram las me 'bar ba dang phur pa yang brdeg par gsungs so //
T02D2211:187b-8: 'byed pa yang lha dang dbral ba ste /
T02D2211:187b-9: dong du gu gul sbyar ma bdug cing /
T02D2211:187b-10: bandha ku ru shag shag a'arya aa ca la shag shag ces pas sngags kyis 'byed par gsungs so //
T02D2211:187b-11: de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba rnams //
T02D2211:187b-12: mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya //
T02D2211:187b-13: zhes pas bsreg pa dang mnan pa dang 'phangs pa la sogs pa mkhas pas shes par bya'o //
T02D2211:187b-14: de rnams sngags kyi mtha' la ni //
T02D2211:187b-16: man ngag go bar byas la sham bu'i sngags gsad
T02D2211:187b-17: ba dang srung ba la sogs bla ma'i man dag
T02D2211:187b-19: mkhas pa'i tshig ces pa ni ma bris so //
T02D2211:187b-20: bdag gis gzhan don rgyas pa ni //
T02D2211:187b-21: bris pas ma legs nyen srid pas //
T02D2211:187b-22: bla ma mkhas pa de la bzod par gsol //
T02D2211:187b-23: klu mo mkha' 'gros byin gyis brlabs pa dang //
T02D2211:187b-24: sems can bdag pas dman la phan par bya phyir dang //
T02D2211:187b-25: rang mos shugs kyis gzhung 'di brtsams //
T02D2211:187b-26: 'di brtsams pa yi dge ba yis //
T02D2211:187b-27: sems can ma lus thams cad kun //
T02D2211:187b-28: sngags kyi mi mthun zad gyur nas //
T02D2211:187b-29: yongs su dag pa'i sa thob shog / sngags kyi
T02D2211:187b-30: rgyan gyi 'grel pa mchog rab kyis mdzad pa rdzogs
